scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=4000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd front && cross-env PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend-only: cd backend && cross-env PORT=4000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend-only: cd front && cross-env PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../front && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run db:setup
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:node_modules: rimraf node_modules && cd backend && rimraf node_modules && cd ../front && rimraf node_modules
scripts.clean:build: cd front && rimraf dist && cd ../backend && rimraf dist
